For Those who are having the crash [acsp.exe stopped working] problem:

...Just Roll Back your Graphics Card Driver..[Go to Device Manager..display..properties]

If that didnt work..then along﻿ with the above step..make the acsp.exe compatible to Windows XP SP3...

Make sure the file is blocked by using firewall
